def is_in_tvroom(remote_control:item):
    # Function to check if a remote is in the TV room
    symbol in_tvroom=exists room: item : is_tvstand(room) and inside(remote_control, room)
    return in_tvroom

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists remote: item : is_remote_control(remote) and is_in_tvroom(remote):
            # If the remote control is already known to be in the TV room, approach it
            bind remote: item where:
                is_remote_control(remote) and is_in_tvroom(remote)
            achieve close_char(char, remote)

        else:
            # Check all remote controls in the scene that have not been visited
            foreach remote: item:
                if is_remote_control(remote) and not visited(remote):
                    observe(remote,"Check is the remote control in the TV room")

def has_switch(remote_control:item):
    # Determine whether the remote control has a switch
    symbol has_switch=exists switch:item: has_switch(remote_control)
    return has_switch

def in_tv_room(remote_control:item):
    # Determine whether the remote control is in the TV room
    symbol in_tv_room=exists room:item: is_television(room) and inside(remote_control, room)
    return in_tv_room

behavior turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control:item, tv:item):
    body:
        if has_switch(remote_control):
            achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
            achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
            # Ensure that the remote is in hand to turn on the TV
            achieve is_on(tv)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        # Select remote control
        bind tv: item where:
            is_television(tv)
        # Select TV
        if in_tv_room(remote_control):
            turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control, tv)
        else:
            achieve inside(remote_control, tv)
            turn_on_tv_with_remote(remote_control, tv)

def has_switch_remote(remote_control:item):
    # Determine whether the remote control has a switch
    return has_switch(remote_control)

behavior press_remote_control(remote_control:item):
    body:
        if has_switch_remote(remote_control):
            achieve_once inhand(remote_control)
            achieve is_on(remote_control)

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control]==2052
        # Select the remote control with ID 2052
        press_remote_control(remote_control)
